generator: edge(Y, X) :- edge(X, Y). { clique(X, Y) } :- edge(X, Y). clique(X) :- clique(X, Y). clique(Y) :- clique(X, Y).

hard_constraints.description: Distinct clique nodes require connecting clique edge.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: 1 { clique(X, Y) ; clique(Y, X) } 1 :- clique(X), clique(Y), X != Y.

hard_constraints.description: Selected edges must exist in original graph.
